title: Make my own custom mini figure
text: First ask me to upload an image and then create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the characters in the picture, in a realistic style, in a real environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is a 3D modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a toy packaging box, designed in a style reminiscent of high-quality collectible figures, printed with original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations.

title: Turn me into a superhero
text: First ask me to upload a selfie. Generate an image based on my selfie of a highly realistic superhero photo. The photo is taken outdoors and I'm flying high above a city. Capture the scene with a natural photographic look, realistic lighting, skin texture, and detail. The framing, angle, and perspective should be as realistic as possible, as if it were an actual photo.

title: Give me an 80s style makeover
text: First ask me to upload a selfie. Then generate an image using my selfie of me with an 80s style makeover.

title: Create a professional headshot
text: First ask me for a selfie. Transform my selfie into a fresh but professional image suitable for a social media profile. The lighting should be natural, flattering, and multidimensional. My head is slightly tilted so it doesn't look stiff and it should look like I'm in a modern, bright office with a blurred background.

title: Mythical Digital Fusion
text: Draw a futuristic 3D creature or artifact born from the fusion of [🔥] and [💩]. The result should look like a legendary digital being — minimalistic, elegant, and mesmerizing. It floats on a pure white background, centered and well-lit with soft studio lighting. The creature combines organic and synthetic elements: glossy surfaces, semi-transparent materials, internal glow, and subtle textures. Style: clean, Apple-product-level polish meets mythical creature design. The final render should feel like a rare, mysterious being displayed in a high-tech digital art museum.

title: Surreal Fluffy Icon
text: Transform a simple flat vector icon of [🔥] into a soft, 3D fluffy object. The shape is fully covered in fur, with hyperrealistic hair texture and soft shadows. The object is centered on a clean, light gray background and floats gently in space. The style is surreal, tactile, and modern, evoking a sense of comfort and playfulness. Studio lighting, high-resolution render.

title: Custom Action Figure
text:
Draw a realistic image of an action figure of a person from a photo. Place equipment/items for the figure next to it, each inside its own blister pack.

Item parameters:
1) [item1_description]
2) [item2_description]
3) [item3_description]
...
n) [itemN_description]

Do not repeat any items.
The figure and all equipment must be inside the blister packs.
The cardboard base holding the blisters should be [base_color].
On the top of the box, write “[person_name]”, and at the bottom, “[figure_label]”.
Visualize in a realistic style.

title: Poster: African Textile Art
text: Poster illustration of [subject] sitting in a chair with a Coca-Cola can. Style: African textile art, bold lines, rhythmic patterns, strong colors, abstract tribal motifs. Composition: Symmetrical layout, decorative borders, ethnic ornaments. Colors: Red, yellow, black, earthy tones. Mood: Energetic, cultural richness, symbolic forms. Quality: Stylized illustration, flat vector look, 8K poster design.

title: Poster: Cuban Revolutionary Style
text: Poster illustration of [subject] in a psychedelic Cuban poster style holding a Coca-Cola can. Style: Cuban revolutionary posters, bright colors, psychedelic vibe, pop art influence. Composition: Dynamic layout, sunburst background, abstract revolutionary motifs. Colors: Pink, orange, teal, yellow. Mood: Playful, ironic, expressive.

title: Poster: Bauhaus Style
text: Poster illustration of [subject] sitting in a Bauhaus-style geometric chair holding a Coca-Cola can. Style: Bauhaus, abstract shapes, minimalism, geometric purity. Composition: Geometric patterns, circles, rectangles behind [subject]. Colors: White, black, red, blue, yellow accents.

title: Poster: Art Deco Style
text: Poster illustration of [subject] sitting in an elegant Art Deco chair holding a Coca-Cola can. Style: Art Deco, elegant geometry, luxury and 1920s glamour. Composition: Symmetrical layout, decorative frames, 1920s poster vibe. Colors: Gold, black, white, silver accents. Quality: Stylized illustration, high detail, 8K poster design.

title: Poster: Vaporwave Style
text: Poster illustration of [subject] sitting in a chair holding a Coca-Cola can. Style: Vaporwave aesthetic, neon lights, retro computer graphics, glitch art, 80s nostalgia. Composition: VHS textures, Greek statues, palm trees, pixelated sun. Colors: Neon pink, cyan, purple, blue gradients.
